name: Aberrant Mind
description: An alien influence has altered your mind, awakening psionic power and strange magical effects.

1.name: Psionic Spells
1.description: Gain additional spells that don't count against spells known; they can be swapped for divination or enchantment spells when leveling.

1.name: Telepathic Speech
1.description: As a bonus action, link telepathically with a creature within 30 feet for minutes equal to your level, communicating over miles equal to your Charisma modifier.

6.name: Psionic Sorcery
6.description: Cast your Psionic Spells with sorcery points instead of slots; when cast this way they require no components.

6.name: Psychic Defenses
6.description: You gain resistance to psychic damage and advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened.

14.name: Revelation in Flesh
14.description: Spend sorcery points to transform, gaining abilities like seeing invisibility, flying, swimming and squeezing through tiny spaces for 10 minutes.

18.name: Warping Implosion
18.description: Teleport up to 120 feet, pulling nearby creatures toward your former space and dealing force damage once per long rest or by spending 5 sorcery points.
